meanings.definition: The state or quality of being joyous
meanings.sent1: The joyousnesses of the children playing in the park was contagious.
meanings.sent2: Her face lit up with joyousnesses when she saw her surprise birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The joyousnesses of the puppy chasing its tail was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with the joyousnesses of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The joyousnesses of the music filled the room with warmth and happiness.

meanings.definition: The feeling of great happiness or pleasure
meanings.sent1: The joyousnesses in her heart overflowed when she received good news.
meanings.sent2: The crowd erupted in joyousnesses when their team won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The joyousnesses of winning the lottery was beyond belief.
meanings.sent4: The joyousnesses of a child opening a present on Christmas morning is priceless.
meanings.sent5: The joyousnesses of a successful surprise party can be felt in the air.
